article_title: Churches urge high court to act on gay marriage
article_text:
Enid, OK (73701)

Today

Windy with scattered thunderstorms developing. A few storms may be severe. High 88F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy and windy during the evening. Cloudy with diminishing winds overnight. A stray severe thunderstorm is possible. Low 67F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph.

article_metadata.author: The Associated Press

og.description: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, in a statement Friday, said it joined a friend-of-the-court brief asking the high court to hear Utah's marriage case.
og.title: Churches urge high court to act on gay marriage
